/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with trees and shrubs, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
